posts.caption: engineering.linkedin.com
posts.description: We're seeking intelligent problem solvers who are inspired and motivated to change the world.

posts.message:
Looking for 2-5 yrs experience .NET dev to join my team (Systems and Infrastructure) in Medstreaming Cairo office. This position might require traveling to US (maybe once a year).

Requirements: 
-Strong server side development skills
-Experience in cross cutting concerns (performance, security, scalability)
-Cloud deployments experience is a plus (specially AWS).
-Strong ability and desire to tackle really vague and complex issues on medical productions systems.
-Experience in data and file synchronization technologies is a plus (SQL replication, Sync Framework, Windows Distributed File System)

Medstreaming is a US based medical IT provider with a wide range of deployments in various medical institutions in US and gulf area including Johns Hopkins Medical School, University of Cincinnati, University of Buffalo, Union Hospital.

email resumes or recommendations to sameh@medstreaming.com
